Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:*Gaaaaasp* A human! Hello! Hi! I'm $Actor_42$ and I am SO excited to meet you!]

[Name:Task_8_Start][Text:Ok ok, this is so exciting! You have NO idea how much I've been wanting to meet a real life human! Is it true that you all live in cities made of stone? And you make htings with METAL?! Could you maybe give me a $Item_37$?]

[Name:Task_8_End][Text:So this is what a $Item_37$ looks like? Wow, it's so shiny... and HEAVY! You made this in your village? Oh... that sounds so neat, could I come live with you? I promise I'll be useful!][SendToTown]

[Name:Task_9_Start][Text: $Town$ is so nice! I always imagined what a human village would look like but this is amazing. And this $WorldObject_28$ is so fancy, I've never seen beds like this before! That being said though... I kind of miss home a little bit. Do you think you could help me get a bit more comfortable?][UnlockObjectID:20]
